Package uk.ac.gla.terrier.applications.desktop

Provides an Java Swing application, based on Terrier, that can be used for searching the desktop of a user.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutTerrier The about dialog for the desktop search application.
DesktopTerrier An application that uses the Terrier DICOM retrieval platform, in order to search a DICOM collection locally.
HelpDialog  
IndexFolders The dialog used for selecting the folders to index.
 

Package uk.ac.gla.terrier.applications.desktop Description

Provides an Java Swing application, based on Terrier, that can be used for searching the desktop of a user. The application can index a range of different file types, such as HTML and PDF documents, as well as Microsoft Word, Excel and Powerpoint documents.
